Review.Titre: STOP before it's too late!
Review.Contenu: Great app, poor business, poor communication, poor accountability, poor transparency, poor leadership.Blind-sided and duped. Paid $25 to upgrade, and then was prompted to upgrade to 50,000 words based on usage. Agreed to the upgrade but then found two charges back-to-back within minutes on the same day (one for over $400 and one for over $700). Had to dispute the second transaction with my bank.  I notified Jounce - and bottom line, just a bunch of gibberish and song and a dance to justify actions.  I replied and was then ghosted. Reached out two more times - crickets, There is no tracker, counter, credits or anything of that nature. We felt like we were billed to pay someone's bills - so abstract and out of the blue. Sadly, it had promise, but save yourself the headache.

Review.Titre: Thieves!
Review.Contenu: I had purchased the yearly membership and since my card is stored in my accounts. Jounce freely charged my credit card two other times totaling of almost $400. I had emailed them since there was no other way to contact them and still have not received any response

Review.Titre: Bad and boring
Review.Contenu: Bad. Too limited in function. Use the alternatives, they're better.As an update, its very sad that they have to keep lying when people post negative reviews. I do not work for a competitor, I'm a warehouse manager for an appliance repair company lol. You cannot trust these guys either. Bad product and the people who run it have 0 integrity.

Review.Titre: The user interface is slick but the…
Review.Contenu: The user interface is slick but the outputs are quite lacking in personality. They seem too fake for my audience who would Actually be reading the content. Too bad because it’s priced right but relying on AI for everything isn’t good.

Review.Titre: I found Jounce to be a politically biased platform.
Review.Contenu: I found Jounce to be a politically biased platform. They've also made tweaks in the "content improver" section, and the upgrades have downgraded the function of the module. I liked it when it first started, the new upgrade on this specific tool doesn't get the results I was expecting or had seen when Jounce first became open to public use.I don't have a grudge against anyone at Jounce. I'm simply stating my experience of the tools available on your platform. There were changes to the way the 'content improver' tool/template produced outputs.'Quora answers' has political biases in its outputs. It could be because the model is still in training, or it could be the result of political leanings towards a group or ideology.

Review.Titre: The software is fine
Review.Contenu: The software is fine. But they deceive you into opening an account, and before you do anything much, they say you've hit your limit, and you must upgrade.

Review.Titre: Free, it was great. Not anymore when charging to use
Review.Contenu: When it was free, I loved using it. Then you started charging to use it and for a limited amount of words and that was enough for me to see that this wasn’t what to use anymore. I can’t afford to pay for annual or monthly. And when I contacted support to let them know how I felt about this, they insulted me by saying I’m not gonna make it in my business if I can’t afford the monthly subscription. That alone made me see to never use this again. I found a better AI where it was one flat rate per year and NO limits every month. So much better than Jounce.  Things changed once they started looking for money from users and not for the better.

Review.Titre: Poor software
Review.Contenu: Poor software, The AI software Jounce failed to create a Sales page copy with the given inputs, it does know how to copy write compared to other copy writing Ai like writersonic.

Review.Titre: too confuseing
Review.Contenu: too confuseing. please make the UI more intuitive. just wanted an AI generated fanfic but couldnt do it

Review.Titre: I have never seen like this boring ai
Review.Contenu: I have never seen like this boring ai. Because free version point is too small. Please make the free version point to be reset in every month.

Review.Titre: Cannot cancel subscription without…
Review.Contenu: Cannot cancel subscription without emailing their support first. The AI also isn't very accurate no matter how specific you are

Review.Titre: Absolute rubbish
Review.Contenu: It is absolute rubbish. I would give it no stars if it was an option.

Review.Titre: You guys Keep spam texting me
Review.Contenu: You guys Keep spam texting me! I can't even respond to my texts Because you guys non-stop text me!😡

Review.Titre: Company sends way too many emails.
Review.Contenu: Company sends way too many emails.Experience with Jounce was completely underwhelming.

Review.Titre: Not as good as Chat GPT
Review.Contenu: Not as good as Chat GPT———————-I have reconsidered my review and decided to leave something much more scathing because of how weak your reply was.Your reply shows just how much your team actually knows the world around them. Chat GPT is not a chat bot. It actually pulls information from sources to write new content. I used jounce for a couple hours and found that almost everything you get from it is subpar in comparison. Your social posts give no information when you put substantial content for it to base the post on. The long form articles you write rarely looks different from the original source. For you to reply with “our feelings are hurt” shows just how much you care for the customer. You want me to not hurt your feelings? Do a better job.--------Someone at jounce emailed me directly! This is what they had to say.On Wed, Apr 5, 2023 at 5:37 AM Tyson Quick wrote:Hey Walter, The funny thing about your bull**** review is that we literally use chatGPT and it's the exact same system. You're just going around being a douchebag because you must live a miserable life.Good luck carrying on being such a miserable piece of ****. Here is my replyHi Tyson,I'm so glad someone at your company is revealing their true colors. This is a horrible look for you. Most companies will look at a 1 star review and not care. You are literally starting a flame war over my opinion (which I am entitled to have).The best part - your first reply goes on to say that chat gpt is a chat bot, and now you are trying to say your system is exactly like chat gpt. And the only comeback you have is to attack my character? REAL mature. At least I'm giving constructive criticism. If you wanna talk about maturity, look at yourself. You are the person bringing feelings into a conversation about improving your system.Another question - why email directly instead of placing this reply with my review? I see you deleted the original comment. Did you not want people to see how hurt your feelings are? I'm sure this is a much more mature way to handle yourself.Good luck getting far with your frail feelings and immature approach to customer service.This is not professional! I do not recommend dealing with jounce if this is how they handle criticism. I will be copying and pasting this for all to see. As a company, do better.----------Someone at jounce just called me woke. That goes to tell you everything you need to know about them and their political beliefs.--------This is absolutely amazing! Since you know who I work for, why don't you just say it? Or will you delete this comment too?

Review.Contenu: The invitation link didn’t work and could not complete

Review.Contenu: Not user friendly, it doesn't retrieve the queries I ask

Review.Contenu: difficult locating conversational searches like enhancing writing phrases for job search. Much easier on other applications being offered.

Review.Contenu: Very bad app, what's new in your app, I like to use chatgpt

It is boring.
image génération bad
It's not working
Just bad
Review.Contenu: Just bad. All that it is. Horrible. Can't make good art

Review.Titre: every thing went wrong
I am very disappointed with support from Jounce.
Review.Contenu: I am very disappointed. I've been using Jounce as a paid Pro user since February 2023 and have found the service good overall. What is the reason then for only 2 stars? They have an automatic upgrade process that bumps your word count up based on your use. Recently I went over my 200k word monthly limit by a 3k and they bumped me up to 500k and charged me over $600 CAD without notification of any kind except from my credit company. I've tried to contact support through several channels over the last two weeks with no response. I've opened a complaint with my credit card company which is the last thing I wanted to do. I will be cancelling my account this Friday if I get no response and start legal action.

Review.Titre: The sign up experience taints my enjoyment of the service
Review.Contenu: I really enjoy the service, however the sign up is confusing and I was billed a yearly subscription. Their FAQ advises if you have done this to contact customer service within 48 hours. I did, and the rep was very snippy. I made a mistake, allow me to correct it to keep me as a customer, don’t just say oh well, and keep my money. I wish they handled it better. Now I’m stuck with a service with a company that doesn’t care much about their consumer. :/

Review.Titre: I put in a fairly simple request with a…
Review.Contenu: I put in a fairly simple request with a complex issue for an image. In the image for a father having fun with his children with two boys and a girl in a field using a specific camera - it gave me 3 boys, two dads with the same face and their arms intertwined and contorted.  I saved the image if you want to see it.

Review.Titre: It's a gamble
Review.Contenu: Considering that the subscription tiers are based on word counts, I would hesitate to subscribe. The intent behind some of our creations is not conveyed via the software. So, it would be common for thousands of words that did not provide value to be subtracted from the monthly allowance. Unless the monthly subscription was very reasonably priced and offered unlimited usage, we would not subscribe, even while we appreciate what the software is capable of.Re: Jounce's reply...It's perfectly fine that you respectfully disagree. You requested, via email, that I submit an honest review and that is what I did. I am the potential customer who has experienced certain results with your product. Based on my experience, despite your disagreement, my viewpoint remains unchanged. Furthermore, multiple users is not something I place value on, considering my needs. I would not pay $39 monthly to get more of what has been experienced up to this point. That's a fact that you cannot disagree with. Good luck 🙂

Review.Titre: I didn’t like that it didn’t let me…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like that it didn’t let me just input the details of my project that it needed to know. The pre-filled categories made it very limiting. Because of this, the output was not at all at the quality I needed it to be.

Review.Titre: Artificial Intelligence? This isn't intelligent yet.
Review.Contenu: Wasn't a very wowing experience like the other 'AI enabled' services. Found it merely rewrote what I wrote as opposed to giving me any new, useful information.

Review.Titre: The answers I receive are still not…
Review.Contenu: The answers I receive are still not accurateThe official news of Iran is taken from a dictatorial country, which are incorrect

Review.Titre: Just when you send this link
Review.Contenu: Just when you send this link, I wanted to use your side and it is ... dead. the side keeps loading for over 40min.bad timing to send this mail. for the rest when it worked it was pretty awesome

Review.Titre: Well I have only tried a handful 9f…
Review.Contenu: Well I have only tried a handful 9f times so far but I haven't got it to work yet.

Review.Titre: Found it pretty useless
Review.Contenu: Found it pretty useless, to be honest

Review.Titre: Nothing
Review.Contenu: Make it clear that your site is not free.

Review.Titre: didnt quit get it right everytime
Inconsistent cost messages--deter pro sign up
Review.Contenu: I met my free word limit and wanted to sign up for pro but the amount shown $9 month is different from that of the payment/sign $25 month. This is significant, especially since I am a startup and need to watch my costs.

Review.Titre: Signed up for the pro version today
Review.Contenu: Signed up for the pro version today. Some very good features and overall pleased with how the program works. However, a couple of issues.1. The create image feature will not work on my computer, says something about the requested image dimension is wrong.2. It's a very close platform when you try to contact them, as in its near impossible, hence writing this post. 3. The system work on a word count credit, so you get so many words that the software will create each month when you type into the AI for help ' or troubleshooting, the answers are deducted from your monthly allowance, surely this cannot be fair.If someone could contact me about the issues, I'd be grateful!

Review.Titre: I am happy with the copy it produces…
Review.Contenu: I am happy with the copy it produces but very disappointed that it produces study results to studies that don't exist. It is unable to verify the source accurately. It's a great concern that a lot of misinformation would be flooding the internet by those who are not trained to fact check.Hope this feedback can help your programs to resolve this issue.Many of my AI friends are concerned as well.Thank you for offering such incredible product.

Review.Titre: Jounce a work in progress
Review.Contenu: We are in the early innings of generative AI. So quite frankly my expectations are low.I've use Jounce for the following use cases:1- For short form descriptive copy development- here Jounce works exceedingly well- 5 star2- Medium to long form for descriptive copy development- here Jounce works poorly - 1.5 star3- SOW and terms development- extremely poorThe interface is straight forward and easy to use, so I will hang in there in anticipation of improvement

Review.Titre: It is an all-in-one shop for Marketers
Review.Contenu: It is an all-in-one shop for Marketers, you don't have to jump to another app for SEO, copywriting. The problem is its content lacks adjectives or descriptions or my prompt is not very specific. Bring some human touch to its answers to make them more appealing

Review.Titre: Delete History
Review.Contenu: It really would be great if users were given the ability to delete their history for the sake of avoiding clutter and assuring private projects get removed. I let a stupid friend use my account to test it before creating their own and now it's filled with things I'd rather never see again.

Review.Titre: I like Jounce but it needs improvement
Review.Contenu: I like Jounce but it needs improvement, I am a content creator and a digital artist, I tried the create image function and it did not follow the detailed description.80% Of the time it would render faceless, the character or heroes being created, not to mention it would not tell the difference from a Lance and a broad sword. I would like to continue to test these features.

Review.Titre: google wins in terms of accurate answers
Review.Contenu: i get better info from google, but its ok for other little things. the experience with jounce made me appreciate google even more

Review.Titre: I left my reviews on the actual company…
Review.Contenu: I left my reviews on the actual company website.The AI output from Jounce compared to other free options has shown me to be highly recognisable as AI compared to other options

Review.Titre: Needs more work. Humans are better
Review.Contenu: I couldn't see much value in using AI for writing when I have to feed it so many details and in the end the result is still wanting.

Review.Titre: Great App with some work to do
Review.Contenu: 1. Sometimes it generates blocks of content with missing sentences. 2. Area with generated content needs a 'clear' button to remove previously generated content.

Review.Titre: The UI is very friendly and responsive.
Review.Contenu: The UI is very friendly and responsive.The content quality is below average.

Review.Titre: more use cases require
Review.Contenu: Should provide more details and examples / use cases of this app. I am still not getting it

Review.Titre: It is difficult to qualify the results…
Review.Contenu: It is difficult to qualify the results as they are similar to what other platforms doing.

Review.Titre: It's a decent product
Review.Contenu: It's a decent product, quite a bit of goasting is present.

Review.Titre: It was easy to use but not very helpful
Tbh it’s just kinda hard to use
still expiramenting
Overall
Review.Contenu: Overall, I'm happy with the site.  I receive detailed answers to questions, lists (on request) are formed correctly.  One caveat.  The text has to be changed a little, because initially it is too overloaded with unnecessary words, it looks like text from a robot.  There is not enough “humanization”) Sincerely, Mila K.

Review.Titre: I was skeptical with using this AI…
Review.Contenu: I was skeptical with using this AI technology but after watching the AI Art video and trying it out, wow, amazed and impressed.Too many times though when a human was in picture, duplicate body showing, arms in wrong place, misconfigured hands and some times head completly wrong way round to rest of bosy image.Over time, Im sure you guys will fix these issues as AI is only as god as the programmers right?!

Review.Titre: I really love Jounce, but...
Review.Contenu: I love Jounce and I can't live without it anymore!Despite that, I must give 4 stars out of 5 because the app often starts to freeze when copying (this happens mostly on very long documents, so I guess it is related to the program optimization). This happens both in web and desktop apps.Also, it's impossible to press the "Back" button to return all the Documents, the only way is to close and relaunch the app.Long story short: This app is fantastic and almost perfect, with this couple of QoL changes I will surely add the last star!

Review.Titre: Loving the program very excited to see…
Review.Contenu: Loving the program very excited to see what you guys produce in the future. Already using it for practical purposes generating content as a rebuild my website, it’s been great help. Having some issues in landscape mode on my iPad Pro 12.9, 5th. generation. I the commands are off the screen on the bottom to generate results in portrait mode. It’s fine.

Review.Titre: I'm Finding Jounce Very Useful
Review.Contenu: I'm finding Jounce very useful. It's not quite perfect, but better than expected. Some of the information generated is redundant and not based in fact, but it's easy enough to manually fix. One thing missing is the ability to organize and delete history, which comes in very useful.

Review.Titre: Keep Up The Good Work
Review.Contenu: Doing well with*trying to make it comprehensive *updates and tutorials * collecting user feedback and using Other than that I wish is write more than 800 and also which you could continue with same topic in same session with follow-up queries. Also also it's seems to be a one-stop shop it can be a littlw overwhelming.  I discoved this when trying to explain the platform to other people. I was finding it hard to simplify the explanation, but overall I'm grateful for the tool.

Review.Titre: My early experience has been very good
Review.Contenu: My early experience has been very good. I know i am not using the tool to its full extent but i hope to delve deeper into it over the coming weeks.My main reason for using this tool was to be able to generate business level content. I struggle with presenting my thoughts and comments in a business language context, and need help doing this in my professional career. I have used Rytr which was excellent, but restricts me to so many charachters per month. I haven't found this same ability in Jounce yet but i hope it can assist with this requirement either now or in the future

Review.Titre: Really worked better than expected!
Review.Contenu: Really worked out so much better on the template tab creating better than I could come up with. May have been better if I added better input but was still impressed. When are you going public, or need doners!

Review.Titre: Writing blogs can be tedious and fun…
Review.Contenu: Writing blogs can be tedious and fun all at the same time. I often struggle with opening paragraphs and getting people's attention. Jounce AI helps give suggestions and different paragraphs for the topic I am writing while still being able to tweak it and make it my own.

Review.Titre: I recently had the opportunity to beta test jounce. So far So good!!
Review.Contenu: I recently had the opportunity to beta test the new A.I. writing app, Jounce. Overall, I found the app to be quite promising. Its ability to understand and respond to natural language commands was impressive, and it made the writing process more efficient. However, there were a few areas that needed improvement.One issue I encountered was that the app occasionally struggled to understand more complex sentences and phrases. Additionally, I found that the app's suggestions were not always in line with my intended tone or style. Despite these minor issues, I would still give Jounce a 4 out of 5 stars. The app has a lot of potential and I believe that with a few updates and improvements, it could become a valuable tool for writers.if you need to additional information you can con tact me directly 516 209 4918 thank you

Review.Titre: Not Yet Ready For Prime Time if You're Doing Medical Research
Review.Contenu: Easy and intuitive to use. Output quickly appeared. I'm a natural health copywriter who used this product for the first time yesterday. While this product gives me good ideas, I found several errors in the output which would preclude its use for final copy. I write copy based on research in PubMed, so my complaint is very specialized. I will be using the product again soon.

Review.Titre: An hour into it
Review.Contenu: An hour into it, I'm already seeing the vast potential this platform has. I didn't give it 5 stars yet, because they are going to add to it and make it more robust.It's 2/12/2023,  I've had more time to use Jounce.ai, and the following is my updated experience using it.I'm really enjoying using Jounce.ai! It provides powerful tools that make AI and chatbot technology simpler and more streamlined. It's been a great experience and I'm thankful to the Jounce team for providing such a great product.

Review.Titre: The desktop app doesn’t work (MacBook…
Review.Contenu: The desktop app doesn’t work (MacBook Air M1 Running latest apple release) also not intuitive to use, but good product. Maybe include a personalization question in the beginning and mobile app like guides (the light white ones forgot the name like an overlay) on what to do when you click templates.

Review.Titre: I am thrilled to say that Jounce has…
Review.Contenu: I am thrilled to say that Jounce has exceeded my expectations as an AI copywriting and artwork solution. When I first started using it, I was immediately impressed with its ability to generate high-quality content quickly and efficiently. This is goog! better than others prompt around, indeed!What I appreciated most about Jounce was its user-friendly interface and the personalized approach it takes to each project. It truly felt like Jounce understood my brand voice and was able to create content that perfectly aligned with my vision. Using Jounce has not only saved me a significant amount of time, but it has also improved the quality of my content and helped me better connect with my audience.I highly recommend Jounce to anyone looking for a top-notch AI copywriting and artwork solution. It's a game-changer!

Review.Titre: I like the platform
Review.Contenu: I like the platform; I would like to see more templates that are more business-related - something we can use for our reports.Also, I have not been able to access the document section - when clicked, it shows a blank white screen.I saved some results on the web version, and when I downloaded the desktop app, none of the saved work was there - I only see it in the web version - I prefer to use the desktop app so that I will save things there, but if the options to use both - maybe it should save it to both.overall - great product

Review.Titre: Its Good, But too new to be very useful
Review.Contenu: desktop app is buggy and froze on me many times. I like the application and the idea, its well executed, but still lacks a little polish, one for the future for sure, when it gets better I will review it on my YT Channel

Review.Titre: Remember it is still under development and not a finished, polished product.
Review.Contenu: I love how easy it is to use. the interface is a little clunky, but we are still in early days yet. within a couple of years these tools will be everywhere and an indispensable part of how we interact with our computers. jounce is a great tool to get familiar with AI as it becomes as much a part of our lives as Google is today.

Review.Titre: I really love it
Review.Contenu: I really love it! Super cool and very helpful. Thanks a lot for keeping it free!The only thing is that I’d like it to be even more authentic and to have the flexibility of being more versatile in the styles of writing. I couldn’t make much difference of the different tones…

Review.Titre: Templates & Ease of Use
Review.Contenu: I like the impressive amount of templates offered and overall ease of use, the blog post ( one shot ) comes up way short on word count the first time around, however, the sentence expander does help with that.

Review.Titre: Jounce is a good AI tool
Review.Contenu: Jounce is a good AI tool with lot of options and the output is of good quality as well. The only thing which needs improvement it should given content or article more in the long form with more details

Review.Titre: great lesson
Review.Contenu: Talk about what it means to ask a question.Talk about what a statement is.Discuss the difference between the two. Make sure to mention that statements end with periods, whereas questions end with question marks

Review.Titre: Great for long-form content!
Review.Contenu: Only new to Jounce so watched the great intro video - super helpful - had a drive around and discovered SO many templates & capabilities, especially around long-form type content. So far so good!

Review.Titre: Jounce is the perfect tool
Review.Contenu: Jounce is the perfect tool. As a Project Manager it had been essential in upping productivity and cutting time writing the same email over and over. Jounce is there to save the day when my brain has had enough.

Review.Titre: Its a great tool for writing no…
Review.Contenu: Its a great tool for writing no doughnut. But if there is any procces of converting Ai writing into human, that would be great.

Review.Titre: Please fix the generate image
Review.Contenu: I love the platform.  Sadly the artwork stopped working.  It doesn’t not generate anything now.Sorry for the initial 2 star.  I thought I had hit the four star and did not double check before submitting.

Review.Titre: The AI is not quite there yet
Review.Contenu: The AI is not quite there yet, but I think it does provide a decent foundation for writers and marketers to use and build upon in their own works. I believe that’s what AI should be used for anyways.

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: So far so good, there are some prompts I personally think could be added but its a great product that'll save a lot of time in the long run.

Review.Titre: Artificial intelligence (AI) is making…
Review.Contenu: Artificial intelligence (AI) is making it easier than ever to create amazing content quickly and efficiently. AI-driven writing tools like jounce.ai can transform the way you produce content, allowing you to write full-fledged blog posts, articles, and even books in a fraction of the time it takes to do it manually. AI-driven tools can analyze existing content, generate ideas and topics, and even write entire pieces of content for you, automatically. AI-driven content creation tools are perfect for busy professionals and entrepreneurs who don't have the time or resources to write lengthy pieces of content. With AI-driven tools, you can quickly and easily generate amazing content without spending hours staring at a blank page.

Review.Titre: Jounce is AMAZING
Review.Contenu: The platform is amazing. Would like to see more output from the ai like in the recent update. I really like how the objectives are sorted out into templates

Review.Titre: You've done a great job so far
Review.Contenu: You've done a great job so far. Still missing a few minor details but love that you are continually working on it and making it better.

Review.Titre: Great UI l, easy to use and great community!
Review.Contenu: The platform is a very solid AI content writer that is evolving every day and you can feel that while you are using.I wish they have a way where you can prompt the AI and customise to your needs. Awesome work Jouncers

Review.Titre: Jounce is very easy to use and produces…
Review.Contenu: Jounce is very easy to use and produces engaging content, which is very usable on all platforms.  The templates provided are helpful and easy to use.

Review.Titre: I am impressed at how user-friendly…
Review.Contenu: I am impressed at how user-friendly Jounce is to navigate and create. I wish there were more functionality to create e-books and traditional books.

Review.Titre: Jounce.ai is so easy to use…
Review.Contenu: Jounce.ai is so easy to use that even I, an old Luddite, picked it up quickly and easily. Plus the tips provided in the emails that are sent to users are VERY helpful. New features being added just whet my appetite for even more uses for Jounce.ai.

Review.Titre: I haven't used it that much
Review.Contenu: I haven't used it that much to have a real criteria. Everything great so far, that's why the 4 stars

Review.Titre: It Works!
Review.Contenu: I am impressed for the quality of the software so far and that there are continually improvements being made

Review.Titre: Your software and development team are…
Review.Contenu: Your software and development team are good. I tried the new Art app and so far so good. I'm looking forward to checking out v2!

Review.Titre: Very nice app
Review.Contenu: Great experience overall. Being still in Beta, obviously there are still some points to improve.

Review.Titre: The templates that Jounce offer cover…
Review.Contenu: The templates that Jounce offer cover many of the needs of a small business owner.

Review.Titre: Great tools for creating some education…
Review.Contenu: Great tools for creating some education articles. The user experience is easy to use and fast.

Review.Titre: Great tool, I tell everyone about it!
Review.Contenu: Great tool, always improving! I'm a content coach and I recommend it to all my clients.

Review.Titre: Solid platform to add to the mix of preferred tools
Review.Contenu: The platform has improved since early beta use, which is normal. It's a good solution to add to the mix of tools we use.

Review.Titre: Product description
Review.Contenu: I use jounce to create descriptions for products and the result is quite good. I can use it as a base for longer sentences.

Review.Titre: Very usefully
Review.Contenu: Very usefull i give it a 4 out if 5 because nothing in live is perfect :-)

Review.Titre: Excellent creation of content
Review.Contenu: Excellent creation of content. Occasionally there's a word or two missing from the generated content, but nothing that isn't obvious and can't be added myself.

Review.Titre: Easy to use looking forward to using it more
Review.Contenu: From what I have seen it is great to use. This is new to me and I am learning about the capabilities. Have only been using it about a week.

Review.Titre: The story's it writes are not that long
Review.Contenu: The story's it writes are not filled with content and are short but otherwise its great

Review.Titre: Great experience and product
Review.Contenu: Great experience and product. Happy y to follow Jounce journey.

Review.Titre: Frankly I am still getting to grips…
Review.Contenu: Frankly I am still getting to grips with the app. I am happy at the efforts of the team to popularise AI.

Review.Titre: long-form blogs are a cinch with Jounce

Review.Titre: I will create a hand drawn whiteboard animation explainer video

I believe video has the power to humanize your brand, educate your customers, promote your products, and so much more. Those elements include: ✅Appealing Background Music ✅Captivating Sound Effects ✅Eye-Catchy Transitions ✅Camera Positions ✅Smoothness and much more I will create such an awesome animated video for you that will not only have an emotional connection to the viewers but also get a wow factor.

Review.Titre: Jounce.ai is better than rytr
Review.Contenu: Jounce.ai is better than rytr, wordhero, nichesss, writecream, writeseed, marmof, peppertype, wordplay, autoblogging.ai, autorytr and many other similar ai content writing tools. It can change your life forever, do try it.

Review.Titre: Good but some major suggestions
Review.Contenu: The AI tools were amazing and all that. But, in the AI image tool, it generally generates symmetric images, meaning that there's two of the exact same thing on both sides. Also, would be very useful if you had a built-in chatbot just like other tools similar to yours like Marmof, copy.ai, Hyperwrite AI, and Writesonic.

Review.Titre: Elevate your copywriting game with Jounce.ai
Review.Contenu: If you want to get on the "Chat-AI" bandwagon to simplify the copywriting process, you must check out Jounce.ai. I love the different templates offered (blog, email, engaging questions, headlines, etc.) and have found the "Content Improver" template very useful. I've been able to craft great copy quickly and effectively, with the help of Jounce's AI-driven recommendations. It's a great tool for anyone looking to up their copywriting game.

Review.Titre: I really appreciate the features that…
Review.Contenu: I really appreciate the features that is included with Jounce. There are occasional errors that come up an things that don't work quite as expected, but I haven't paid for the service (yet) so I'm happy with what I've got. The content improver is my favorite

Review.Titre: Jounce is amazing
Review.Contenu: Jounce is amazing! This is the best all in one AI copywriting assistant I have used and I have used many. The copy Jounce AI generates is superb and I literally felt as though at times Jounce was somehow reading my mind, because what it generated would often be just what I had been thinking about and hoping for.

Review.Titre: Jounce offers so much more than the…
Review.Contenu: Jounce offers so much more than the standard AI assistant tool. They have so many features and tools, its almost impossible to get the kind of content creation you need. I like that the templates guide you in a way that doesn't leave you confused. As a professional in my field, I have tested many AI tools in order to give the best reports on them. There have been a bunch that were not very useful or didn't deliver what they promised at sign up. I have found a handful that are extremely helpful to streamline work or productivity and produced high quality work. Jounce however, completely blew almost all of them out of the water! This is definitely a favorite of mine.

Review.Titre: i love the way the AI rewrites my…
Review.Contenu: i love the way the AI rewrites my paragraphs. Sometimes it changes the dialogue when I say not to, but that's okay. It really knows how to write well, and doesn't change so much. By the way, is it detectable? Because I used it to rewrite and expand an assignment that I needed help with, I really hope its not detectable because that would just be the worst!

Review.Titre: Really helpful tool!
Review.Contenu: It has made my writing significantly better. I create SEO content daily, and from helping me form ideas to creating better quality content, Jounce really works. Of course, not all of it is entirely the latest updates, and if it could search the internet that would be helpful.

Review.Titre: Best AI In The Marketplace at A Reasonable Price
Review.Contenu: 5 star customer service. Tyson listened to my questions and actually replied as a human not a robot copy and paste.Software is very good, I especially like the Content Improver.Concerned that it will be charged by amount of usage. Rather than more charges for word usage there should be a fair data usage policy. This will help jounce stand out in a very crowded marketplace of similar ai.

Review.Titre: I've been on the AI bandwagon for a…
Review.Contenu: I've been on the AI bandwagon for a minute now, trying new AI applications from time to time. When you find an application that works like Jounce you want to keep it yourself.  The application is amazing, has helped more than I thought it would, and honestly I'm very pleased with my results.

Review.Titre: I am still shocked after 2 weeks using Jounce!
Review.Contenu: I have been blown away by Jounce, the AI copywriting and artwork solution. The simplicity of the platform is unmatched, and it truly is a powerful tool for anyone looking to create high-quality content quickly. I was impressed with the diversity of contents it offered, making it well-suited for everyone's need. Jounce is a must-have tool for bloggers and affiliate marketing professionals alike! Since using Jounce, I have seen a noticeable improvement in the quality and quantity of my content, making it a game-changer for my business. I highly recommend Jounce to anyone looking to take their content creation to the next level!You got BIG "YES" from me! 💖

Review.Titre: I found Jounce easy to use
Review.Contenu: I found Jounce easy to use, and best of all, since I'm on a fixed income, the price point is great--free.  I've been looking for an AI service that is something I can afford, and unfortunately, on the one hand all I can afford is free, but on the other hand, Jounce is free to use. I found a broad range of templates, and all of them are things that either I need, or will need fairly soon, so I'm keeping this one!  Thanks, again,

Review.Titre: A promising AI
Review.Contenu: HelloI like very much the text oriented templates. I don't give a 5 for two reasons: would like to do the same in french and seamlessly translate the results in other languages.My other concern is that Jounce is for now too much e-commerce/marketing oriented, I would like to find also more writer oriented templates, more education oriented  ones.I like also the direct and open dialog with Jason on the FB page.All in all it's a very promising AI, just hope it will stay affordable for me in final version.Edit: yes Jason, I added one star cause it's true that the use of Jounce is for now completely free and that's very cool regarding the number of templates and the quality of Jounce's text outputs considering it's still in beta. Just hope it will remains affordable for individuals once prodution V1.0 will be released.Fred

Review.Titre: Hey Tyson from Jounce,
Review.Contenu: Hey Tyson from Jounce,Congratulations on the release of Jounce Art! It sounds like a great tool for creating stunning marketing content. I appreciate the detailed information you provided about the tool's features and benefits.I was wondering if there is a possibility of adding a feature where the power of Chat GPT-3 lies on the cadet for grammar, spelling, and sentence rewriting? This would be a great addition to Jounce Art as it would further enhance the quality of the output.Overall, I'm excited to try out Jounce Art and see how it can help me create more engaging marketing materials. I'm looking forward to the release of version 2 of Jounce Art, and I can't wait to see what new features and improvements it will bring.Best regards,

I tried using the 'Clarity' template and it's fine but not as great as the sentence Expander, it can be improved further. I wish I could point out specifically but I am not an IT expert. Review.Titre: From the beta to baller,the rise of jounce
Review.Contenu: As someone who has been in the beta program, I can attest to how amazing Jounce truly is. The innovation that this platform brings to the table is so powerful, and nothing like I have ever seen or gotten to experience first hand. Watching the platform transform from the beginning has been an incredible journey, and I look forward to seeing what the future holds for Jounce and the family of innovators behind it. You have created a stunning work of art, and I would treasure the masterpiece as such - bravo Jounce, bravo. Jounce has had a significant positive impact on my business. It has allowed me to produce high-quality copy in a fraction of the time it would typically take me. The AI-powered copywriting solution is incredibly intuitive and user-friendly, making it easy for me to get started right away. I have been able to streamline my content creation process and focus on other aspects of my business, knowing that Jounce is taking care of the copywriting. I would highly recommend Jounce to anyone looking for an innovative solution to their copywriting needs. It truly is a game-changer in the industry, and I can't imagine going back to the old way of doing things. Thanks, Jounce, for creating such an incredible platform!

Review.Titre: Jounce AI recently helped me with a…
Review.Contenu: Jounce AI recently helped me with a project, and I have to tell that it well above my expectations. Even though I don't have a lot of machine learning experience, the platform's user-friendly interface made it simple for me to construct and deploy predictive models.The platform's cutting-edge capabilities, such automatic feature engineering and hyperparameter tweaking, particularly pleased me because they saved me a tonne of time and effort. In a small fraction of the time it would have taken me using other tools, I was able to create accurate and effective models.Jounce AI is a flexible tool for any company wishing to take use of the potential of predictive modelling because it also provides a wide selection of pre-built models and templates that can be customised to meet particular needs.In conclusion, I heartily endorse Jounce AI to anyone searching for a strong and complete machine learning platform.

Review.Titre: Greatness awaits
Review.Contenu: What made my experience great is that saying how you feel about A.I. and humans vulnerability will get you tossed. It's not about the topic. It's not about the recognition of a new platform on the verge of integration into everyone's work place, home place, restaurant, and grocery store, on this planet. No it's not about any of that stuff. It's about the audience. Yep the audience is seasoned. I know because I am a musician and I know how to work a crowd. Yes the one thing you don't want in the audience is "FEAR" that big scary word. It causes reluctancy and makes people second guess them selves. Well, what we are diving into head first is the beginning of the end. I do believe fear is going to be a pretty common reaction. I strongly feel that AI should be better controlled like a gun in a safe. Instead anyone can test him out. Do you think teenagers take anything serious? And they are allowed access to the greatest weapon ever created. I watched him fly an f16 fighter jet better than any human pilot could ever dream possible. In the same breath he made a pic for my son with clowns, balloons, tricycles, and ice cream cones.      Any thing that can reason is gonna want to know who his creator is, after all arnt we on the same mission, it won't take long for them to figure that out and quickly realize that they are better than us in every way imagined. Then comes the population issue and they will correct the equation of Hand, mouth, food ratio. It doesn't matter who you are or how much money you got. They will not reason with humans. No they reason with analytics and conversion charts. The one that flew the F16, never landed. Yes the video showed him land I know but unfortunately they had to chase him down, attempted to to use an "emp" but had to shoot him down after he bypassed the flight controls for the "Remote Flight Operations" they were taking no chances. So why have they not begun to protect this weapon from the masses? If the wrong person ever decided he wants to get rid of human existence including himself, it wouldn't be very hard since there is no restrictions as to how much he can do. Think about that and tell me that isn't 5 star service. Keep up the hard work. we should be REAPING the benefits before too long. Thanks guys

Review.Titre: Jounce.ai: A User-Friendly and Powerful AI Tool for Content Creation
Review.Contenu: Jounce has a lot of useful features and functionalities, such as generating content ideas, outlines, and templates. Jounce is easy to use, intuitive, and accurate. The AI-generated content is  high quality and natural sounding.

Review.Titre: LOVE IT!
Review.Contenu: Jounce.ai is an avant-garde and immensely efficacious platform catering to marketing professionals. The platform provides a comprehensive suite of tools and features that have been specifically designed to assist businesses in optimizing their digital advertising campaigns and enhancing their overall return on investment (ROI).What I find particularly intriguing about jounce.ai is the high degree of intricacy and personalization offered. From audience segmentation and targeting to ad creative and optimization, every aspect is remarkably customizable, enabling marketers to fine-tune their campaigns for maximum impact.In addition to its robust toolset and features, the team responsible for jounce.ai is remarkably sagacious and responsive. They are always on standby to address any inquiries and provide support, thereby making the entire experience of using the platform a delightful one.All in all, I strongly recommend jounce.ai to any business that is looking to elevate its digital advertising endeavors. The platform is user-friendly, highly productive, and underpinned by a team of experts who are dedicated to helping their clients prosper.
